channel.title: CVE Feed for TOBESOFT.CO.LTD -- MIPLATFORM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TOBESOFT.CO.LTD -- MIPLATFORM

item.title: CVE-2019-19161|2024-08-05T02:09:39.343Z -- tobesoft.co.ltd -- miplatform
item.description: CyMiInstaller322 ActiveX which runs MIPLATFORM downloads files required to run applications. A vulnerability in downloading files by CyMiInstaller322 ActiveX caused by an attacker to download randomly generated DLL files and MIPLATFORM to load those DLLs due to insufficient verification.
